Reviews.Title: “Lots of choices, don't pick this one!”
Reviews.Author: HollynannaArizona
Reviews.Content: travel phoenix regularly luck expensive motels time horrible concert closeby motel lobby stinks stinks cockroach bathtub dirty bathroom door beds joke hard uncomfortable flat fitted sheets undone time light bulbs missing stains carpet chair broken tv channels didnt curtain broken desk clerk didnt mention free breakfast morning trusted cleanliness ugh ugh

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: Meg_baca512
Reviews.Content: dont care customer service flight delayed didnt land midnight called hotel pick hour 2 phone calls saying answer hotel front door locked call bang door 15 minutes guy sleeping time service gross breakfast 78 recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “About average for what it is... a cheap hotel”
Reviews.Author: yayhasplz
Reviews.Content: late night flight stay move nicer town 45night didnt expect clean except crusty stain floor smell shower hot pressure bed decent neighborhood car worry safe wander street am single lady travelling fine luxuries bugs decent value considering nicer hotels times price plan stay return phoenix

Reviews.Title: “Clean and cheap.”
Reviews.Author: Elisabeth1961
Reviews.Content: incoming outgoing flight price clean lady frontdesk helpfull wireless internet didnt time cable perfect breakfast standard included price computer frontdesk didnt bring own expect phoenix near airport am woman travels havent afraid moment dont dwell street night hotel stay overnight else clean safe
